Section.name: Highlighted Additions/Changes
Section.p: This release contains the following significant updates and extensions to the SIF specification.

ul.li: StudentDataTransferNote/CountriesOfCizitenship, PreviousSchoolType/CommonwealthId, ArrivalSchoolType/CommonwealthId, DepartureSchoolType/CommonwealthId: updates to Student Data Transfer Note.
StudentDataTransferNote/LBOTE: changed from AUCodeSetsYesOrNoCategoryType to xs:boolean.

StudentDataTransferNote/RequestID, StudentDataTransferNote/AdditionalNotes, StudentDataTransferNote/Healthcare, StudentDataTransferNote/InterestTalents, StudentDataTransferNote/SupportNeeds, StudentDataTransferNote/Consent, StudentDataTransferNote/LatestReportAvailable, StudentDataTransferNote/DisciplinaryAbsences, StudentDataTransferNote/IndividualBehaviourManagementPlan, StudentDataTransferNote/Attachments, StudentDataTransferNote/AustralianCitizenship, DepartureSchoolType/State, DepartureSchoolType/Sector, DepartureSchoolType/System, DepartureSchoolType/StartedAtSchoolDate, DepartureSchoolType/ExitDate, PreviousSchoolType/State, PreviousSchoolType/Sector, PreviousSchoolType/System, PreviousSchoolType/ExitReason: updates to Student Data Transfer Note.
STDNSupportNeedsType, STDNAttachmentListType, STDNAttachmentType: updates to Student Data Transfer Note.
GradeProgressLevel: reporting of grade as Below Level/At Level/Above Level.
